definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw round, make a circle (Aram. h.og circumivit; n. h.owgt0, [[חוּגְתָּא]], circle, vault of heavens)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[חׂק חָג על־פני]] [[מים]] Job 26:10 (cf. Pr 8:27), hath drawn as a circle a bound, etc., of the horizon-line.
